mapper.select: SELECT r.data_scope FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_delete = 0

SELECT r.id, r.NAME, r.LEVEL, r.description, r.data_scope, r.create_by, r.update_by, r.create_time, r.update_time, r.is_delete FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.is_delete = 0 AND r.is_delete = 0 AND u.id = #{userId}

SELECT id, `name`, `level`, description, data_scope, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time FROM sys_role WHERE is_delete = 0
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role.name},'%')
AND description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role.description},'%')
AND data_scope LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role.dataScope},'%')

SELECT m.id, m.pid, m.sub_count, m.type, m.title, m.`name`, m.component, m.icon, m.path, m.i_frame, m.`cache`, m.hidden, m.permission, m.sort, m.create_by, m.update_by, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.is_delete FROM sys_role r, sys_role_menu rm, sys_menu m WHERE r.id = rm.role_id AND rm.menu_id = m.id AND m.is_delete = 0 AND r.id = #{id}

SELECT d.id, d.pid, d.sub_count, d.`name`, d.enabled, d.sort, d.create_by, d.update_by, d.create_time, d.update_time, d.is_delete FROM sys_role r, sys_role_dept rd, sys_dept d WHERE r.id = rd.role_id AND rd.dept_id = d.id AND d.enabled = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND r.id = #{id}
